0: Please find the JSON object below, which includes all requested information about the ABM model's purpose:JSON Object:{"Model_Purpose": {"full_description": "The model aims to explore the dynamics of poverty lines using agent-based modeling, specifically focusing on the impact of changes in income distribution on poverty rates.","research_questions": ["What are the effects of changes in income distribution on poverty rates?", "How does the distribution of essential investment goods affect poverty rates?"],"system_boundaries": [],"outcome_variables": {"income_mean": "The mean income of the population.","income_std": "The standard deviation of income.","poverty_rate": "The percentage of the population living below the poverty line."}}Please note that the full description of the model's purpose provides additional context for understanding the research questions and outcome variables.
